channel.title: New Semester :: CC 410 Textbook
channel.description: This page contains notes on deploying this course for a new semester. There are many things to remember to do! Hugo Website Make new semester branch Copy old Introduction to a folder and update new version Copy old Syllabus to a folder and update new version Copy old Milestones to a folder and update new version #TODO: Merge new semester branch to master and deploy before semester starts
